contactus: Please contact us with any comments, questions or suggestions that you may have, we’ll reply to you within 24 hours. Contact Time: 7 days * 24 Hours.
shippingterms: We accepted International order. We ship to Worldwide except Italy due to strict custom inspection and terrible delay. We only ship to the confirmed address provided by PayPal . In addition, please leave your Phone No. for writing in shipping document.
shippingmethod: All items will be shipped by Post via airmail. You can choose registered post with tracking number provided by paying an extra US$3 for the postal insurance. We are not responsible for any loss in the mail if the item is not insured. We offer combined shipping for some certain items which will save your shipping cost greatly for your multiple purchases. Please do not pay until you make your last purchase.
paymentmethod: We only accept PayPal . Payment need be made within 48hrs of the auction end time. Non-Paying bidders will be reported.
shippingtime: All items will be shipped within 24 business hours upon receipt of payment (Including Saturday and Sunday). Country Approx. Delivery time United States / United Kingdom / Australia/ Canada / France / Spain / Germany/ 7 7-15 working days Eastern Europeand other regions Generally 10-20 working days But sometimes maybe take up to    4-6 weeks due to strict Custom Inspection We are    unable to take any responsibility for any custom delay or tax. Because transit time highly depends on different countries’ Postal Service (especially weekends and holidays).
